item.title: Homebrew Tap
item.author: Victor Ma
item.description: Homebrew Tap Currently I have only 3 taps 1 2 3 4 % brew tap homebrew/cask homebrew/cask-versions homebrew/core When searching, the results are from those 3 taps. 1 2 3 4 5 6 % brew search aws-sam-cli ==> Formulae aws-sam-cli aws-sso-cli ==> Casks aws-vpn-client Let’s add another Tap, it’s from AWS. 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 % brew tap aws/tap Running `brew update --auto-update`.
